utilities
Class Communicator

java.lang.Object
  utilities.Communicator

public class Communicator
extends java.lang.Object

This class will communicate with the slave NXT and initialize the ports on it. Only uses the motor and the ultrasonicSensors on the other NXT as it is impossible to initialize a ColorSensor on the remote NXT.

The first version of this class (as seen in the git commit logs) show that this class used the built in functions already provided in LEJOS. However, the built in functionality turned out to be unreliable and we have rewrote the functionality. This has greatly improved the reliability of the communication between the two classes.

Constructor Detail

Communicator

public Communicator(java.lang.String extendedNXT)
Master communicator. Establishes and stores the RS485 connection to the slave NXT. It will also open the input & output data streams

Parameters:
extendedNXT -
Method Detail

catchBug

public static void catchBug(java.lang.String bug)
The static helper method here just exits the system when commanded. It displays a message on the NXT for the user.

Parameters:
bug - A String object with the message on screen.
